messages.title: The Lib Dems difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services.

messages.title: OUR NHS: At risk
messages.content: Tory Heath spokesman accepted a £21,000 donation from private health firm boss. David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners. Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg's tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn—cutting most tax bills by £700.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Are the only party who can challenge the Conservatives in Mid Derbyshire

issues.economy: Vince Cable and the Lib Dems foresaw the bank collapse and have a costed economic recovery plan
issues.health: OUR NHS: At risk with the Conservatives. What else aren't the Conservatives telling you?

leaflet.personalStatement: Sally McIntosh grew up in Mid Derbyshire and has been working with young people from the area for the last 8 years. She has experience from outside politics.

politicalExperience.role: Influencing local, regional and national developments and decisions

quotes.text: We've lived through this mistake for 60 years now... The reality is, it [the NHS] hasn't worked - it has made people iller...
quotes.source: Senior Conservative MEP Dan Hannan, Summer 2009

quotes.text: Tory Heath spokesman accepted a £21,000 donation from private health firm boss.
David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners.
Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Join the campaign for change that works for you.
